cause.description:
Enough. He's been here for almost 7 weeks. The time has come. The time is now. Nick Hatzinas, will you please go now!
1. This man must be stopped.
2. I think there are people back home that miss him.
3. He should be treated for "little man" syndrome.
cause.mission: raise enough dough to ship the fucker back to his orange farm
cause.name: Send Nick Back to Greece
